name: Total Party Kill (MagicoDave)
description:
In Total Party Kill, you have to stop the raiding aventurers from destroying the Orc Village! To do so, you can setup towers to stop them dead on their tracks!
How to play: Stop enemies from reaching the end of the level by constructing towers. Press on the white squares (fundations) to open the tower selection menu. Choose a tower and if you got enough gold, you will build it. Towers attack enemies on their own. Killing enemies gives you gold and increase your score. Letting them pass reduces your lifes. Have fun!
